testCase.requirementText: Type of locator mets/amdSec/rightsMD/mdRef[@xlink:type='simple'] Attribute used with the value “simple”. Value list is maintained by the xlink standard.
testCase.description: The xlink:type is optional in METS.xsd but mandatory in CSIP50. If present: any value other than "simple" will break the xml according to the METS schema. Therefore this testcase only checks for the existance of the attribute

rule.description: The attribute xlink_type MUST exist in the mptr-element like this: @xlink:type='simple'

error.message: The attribute xlink_type MUST exist in the mptr-element like this: @xlink:type='simple'
